game.title: Ancient Relic
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient relic from the forgotten temple.
game.description: Centuries ago, a powerful relic was hidden away in a forgotten temple, lost to time. The artifact is said to possess immense power, and you must retrieve it before it falls into the wrong hands.
game.reward: A reward of gold and a powerful artifact.

task.description: The temple is located deep in the heart of the jungle, shrouded in mystery and danger.

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the temple.
task.description: Once you reach the temple, you must find the hidden entrance, concealed by ancient vines and crumbling stone.
Inside the temple, you will encounter traps, puzzles, and guardians protecting the relic.
Finally, you will reach the sanctum where the relic is hidden. Be prepared for a final challenge.

task.objective: Return to the archaeologist with the relic.
task.description: Once you have the relic, return to the archaeologist who sent you on this quest.
